import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import cylinderImage from "./cylinder.jpg"; import axios from "axios"; function NavBar(props) { const handleDelete = () => { axios .get("http://localhost:3001/logout") .then((res) => { props.setName(""); localStorage.removeItem("isAuthenticated"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (
LPG Distributor
  • Home
  • {props.userName}
  • About
  • Contact Us
); } export default NavBar;
